name: Box Brownie Waffle Sundae Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: brownie mix, vanilla ice cream, caramel sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 box brownie mix, prepared according to package instructions
recipeInstructionSteps: Place 4 large dollops of brownie batter in a preheated, greased waffle iron.
Cook for 2-3 minutes, until brownies are semi-firm to the touch.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce.
